pullRequest.title: (#1445) Cleanup around Scalar and Callable
pullRequest.bodyText:
This is for #1445.
On top of the requirements from the ticket, I took the liberty of simplifying the constructors of some of the classes that interacts with Scalar and Callable for consistency sake. It's mainly deleting stuffs in order to limit the responsibility of each class.

nodes.bodyText: @victornoel  Why is it a Scalar and not a Runnable?
@victornoel This type of ctor doesn't make much sense, why would one want to wrap pre-existing Proc with ProcOf?
@victornoel Can this type of test be migrated to @RepeatedTest annotation?
